name: Lump Sum
description: Price is fixed for a set of documents.

name: Cost Plus % fee, not to Exceed
description: Two-tiered approach, percentage of the spent on the project but the fee cannot exceed a specified amount.

name: Sub Contract
description: The contractor does not have a direct relationship to the owner.

name: Insurance Agreement/Unit Pricing
description: Unit pricing provided by the contractor at the time of the bid. Administrative costs are part of the pricing, generally with % of the contract for profit.
